scoreInfo.title: Score Information
scoreInfo.description: Your score is calculated based on several factors that measure your trading performance:

pip.title: Pip Performance
pip.description: The difference between entry and exit prices, measured in pips. Higher pip gains contribute more to your score.

riskReward.title: Risk/Reward Ratio
riskReward.description: The ratio between potential profit and potential loss. Better risk/reward ratios lead to higher scores.

totalSignals.title: Total Signals
totalSignals.description: The number of signals you've provided. More signals with good performance increase your overall score.

addSignal.title: Add New Signal

hint.buy: must be greater than entry price
hint.sell: must be less than entry price

hint.sell: must be greater than entry price
